summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding a FOIA request for Jeffrey Epstein's autopsy report from the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME). The email includes an attachment of the autopsy report with planned redactions indicated.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who attaches the OCME Report of Autopsy for Jeffrey Epstein and notes where redactions will be made.

events.title: FOIA Request for Epstein Autopsy Report
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends the OCME Report of Autopsy for Jeffrey Epstein via email in response to a FOIA request, noting planned redactions.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding a FOIA request for Jeffrey Epstein's autopsy report from the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME).
The attached OCME Report of Autopsy has boxes indicating where redactions will be applied before release.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, located in White Plains, NY.
The email demonstrates the process of handling sensitive documents related to Epstein's death under FOIA regulations.
